item.title: The Real Meaning Behind The War Boys' Hand Symbol In Mad Max: Fury Road
item.description: The War Boys use a distinctive identifying hand gesture all throughout Mad Max: Fury Road, but what does their hand symbol actually mean?

item.title: Wolf Man: The 1941 Classic Horror Film Is Secretly About Persecuted Jews During World War II
item.description: Screenwriter Curt Siodmak wrote 1941's The Wolf Man as an allegory for his experiences as a Jewish man living through the horrors of World War II.

item.title: Every Sophie Thatcher Horror Movie, Ranked Worst To Best
item.description: Sophie Thatcher is a rising star in Hollywood, and with the release of her newest movie alongside Jack Quaid, these are her best horror films, ranked.
